p: Legs: Respective chaetotaxy of legs I–III, is as follows: Subcoxa I– 1,2?,2?; Subcoxa II– 0,2,2; Coxa– 3,6,7–8?; Trochanter– 6,6,6; Femur– 13,12,11; Tibiotarsus– 19,19,18. Tita I–III with M chaeta basally displaced, B4 slightly longer than B5; Claw with basal inner tooth; Claw:Tita ratio = 1:1.5 ( Fig 3B–3D).
